  1. var singularize = require('../support/inflection').singularize;
  3. exports.Map = Map;1
  5. /**
  6.  * Routing map drawer. Encapsulates all logic required for drawing maps:
  7.  * namespaces, resources, get, post, put, ..., all requests
  8.  *
  9.  * @param {Object} app - RailwayJS or ExpressJS application
  10.  * @param {Function} bridge - some bridge method that will server requests from
  11.  * routing map to application
  12.  *
  13.  * Usage example:
  14.  *
  15.  *     var map = new require('railway-routes').Map(app, handler);
  16.  *     map.resources('posts');
  17.  *     map.namespace('admin', function (admin) {
  18.  *        admin.resources('users');
  19.  *     });
  20.  *
  21.  * Example `handler` loads controller and performs required action:
  22.  *
  23.  *     function handler(ns, controller, action) {
  24.  *         try {
  25.  *             var ctlFile = './controllers/' + ns + controller + '_controller';
  26.  *             var responseHandler =  require(ctlFile)[action];
  27.  *         } catch(e) {}
  28.  *         return responseHandler || function (req, res) {
  29.  *             res.send('Handler not found for ' + ns + controller + '#' + action);
  30.  *         };
  31.  *     }
  32.  *
  33.  */
  34. function Map(app, bridge) {
  35.     if (!(this instanceof Map)) return new Map(app, bridge);7
  36.     this.app = app;7
  37.     this.bridge = bridge;7
  38.     this.paths = [];7
  39.     this.ns = '';7
  40.     // wtf???
  41.     this.globPath = '/';7
  42.     this.pathTo = {};7
  43.     this.dump = [];7
  44.     this.middlewareStack = [];7
  45. }
  47. /**
  48.  * Calculate url helper name for given path and action
  49.  *
  50.  * @param {String} path
  51.  * @param {String} action
  52.  */
  53. Map.prototype.urlHelperName = function (path, action) {
  54.     if (path instanceof RegExp) {
  55.         path = path.toString().replace(/[^a-z]+/ig, '/');
  56.     }
  58.     // handle root paths
  59.     if (path === '' || path === '/') return 'root';49
  61.     // remove trailing slashes and split to parts
  62.     path = path.replace(/^\/|\/$/g, '').split('/');49
  64.     var helperName = [];49
  65.     path.forEach(function (token, index, all) {
  66.         // skip variables
  67.         if (token[0] == ':') return;73
  69.         var nextToken = all[index + 1] || '';73
  70.         // current token is last?
  71.         if (index == all.length - 1) {
  72.             token = token.replace(/\.:format\??$/, '');37
  73.             // same as action? - prepend
  74.             if (token == action) {
  75.                 helperName.unshift(token);8
  76.                 return;8
  77.             }
  78.         }
  79.         if (nextToken[0] == ':' || nextToken == 'new.:format?') {
  80.             token = singularize(token);20
  81.         }
  82.         helperName.push(token);65
  83.     });49
  84.     return helperName.join('_');49
  85. };1
  87. /**
  88.  * Map root url
  89.  */
  90. Map.prototype.root = function (handler, middleware, options) {
  91.     this.get('/', handler, middleware, options);1
  92. };1
  94. ['get', 'post', 'put', 'delete', 'del', 'all'].forEach(function (method) {
  95.     Map.prototype[method] = function (subpath, handler, middleware, options) {
  97.         var controller, action;31
  98.         if (typeof handler === 'string') {
  99.             controller = handler.split('#')[0];31
  100.             action = handler.split('#')[1];31
  101.         }
  103.         var path;31
  104.         if (typeof subpath === 'string') {
  105.             path = this.globPath + subpath.replace(/^\/|\/$/, '');31
  106.         } else { // regex???
  107.             path = subpath;
  108.         }
  110.         // only accept functions in before filter when it's an array
  111.         if (middleware instanceof Array) {
  112.             var before_filter_functions = middleware.filter(function(filter) {
  113.                 return (typeof filter === 'function');
  114.             });
  115.             middleware = before_filter_functions.length > 0 ? before_filter_functions : null;
  116.         }
  118.         if (!(typeof middleware === 'function' || (middleware instanceof Array)) && typeof options === 'undefined') {
  119.             options = middleware;10
  120.             middleware = null;10
  121.         }
  123.         if (!options) {
  124.             options = {};8
  125.         }
  127.         path = options.collection ? path.replace(/\/:.*_id/, '') : path;31
  129.         var args = [path];31
  130.         if (middleware) {
  131.             args = args.concat(this.middlewareStack.concat(middleware));
  132.         }
  133.         args = args.concat(this.bridge(this.ns, controller, action, options));31
  135.         this.dump.push({
  136.             helper: options.as || this.urlHelperName(path, action),
  137.             method: method,
  138.             path: path,
  139.             file: this.ns + controller,
  140.             name: controller,
  141.             action: action
  142.         });31
  144.         this.addPath(path, action, options.as);31
  146.         this.app[method].apply(this.app, args);31
  147.     };6
  148. });1
  150. /**
  151.  * Add path helper to `pathTo` collection
  152.  */
  153. Map.prototype.addPath = function (templatePath, action, helperName) {
  154.     var app = this.app;31
  156.     if (templatePath instanceof RegExp) {
  157.         // TODO: think about adding to `path_to` routes by reg ex
  158.         return;
  159.     }
  160.     var paramsLength = templatePath.match(/\/:/g);31
  161.     paramsLength = paramsLength === null ? 0 : paramsLength.length;31
  162.     helperName = helperName || this.urlHelperName(templatePath, action);31
  164.     // already defined? not need to redefine
  165.     if (this.pathTo[helperName]) return;20
  167.     this.pathTo[helperName] = function () {
  168.         if (arguments.length < paramsLength) {
  169.             return '';
  170.             // throw new Error('Expected at least ' + paramsLength + ' params for build path ' + templatePath + ' but only ' + arguments.length + ' passed');
  171.         }
  172.         var value, arg, path = templatePath;25
  173.         for (var i = 0; i < paramsLength; i += 1) {
  174.             value = null;8
  175.             arg = arguments[i];8
  176.             if (arg && typeof arg.to_param == 'function') {
  177.                 value = arg.to_param();
  178.             } else if (arg && arg.id) {
  179.                 value = arg.id;
  180.             } else {
  181.                 value = arg;8
  182.             }
  183.             path = path.replace(/:\w*/, value);8
  184.         }
  185.         if (arguments[paramsLength]) {
  186.             var query = [];
  187.             for (var key in arguments[paramsLength]) {
  188.                 if (key == 'format' && path.match(/\.:format\??$/)) {
  189.                     path = path.replace(/\.:format\??$/, '.' + arguments[paramsLength][key]);
  190.                 } else {
  191.                     query.push(key + '=' + arguments[paramsLength][key]);
  192.                 }
  193.             }
  194.             if (query.length) {
  195.                 path += '?' + query.join('&');
  196.             }
  197.         }
  198.         path = path.replace(/\.:format\?/, '');25
  199.         // add ability to hook url handling via app
  200.         if (this.app.hooks && this.app.hooks.path) {
  201.             this.app.hooks.path.forEach(function (hook) {
  202.                 path = hook(path);
  203.             });
  204.         }
  205.         var appprefix = '';25
  206.         if (app.path) {
  207.             appprefix = app.path();
  208.         } else {
  209.             appprefix = app.set('basepath') || '';25
  210.         }
  211.         return appprefix + path;25
  212.     }.bind(this);20
  213.     this.pathTo[helperName].toString = function () {
  214.         return this.pathTo[helperName]();8
  215.     }.bind(this);20
  216. }
  218. /**
  219.  * Resources mapper
  220.  *
  221.  * Example
  222.  *
  223.  *     map.resources('users');
  224.  *
  225.  */
  226. Map.prototype.resources = function (name, params, actions) {
  227.     var self = this;3
  228.     // params are optional
  229.     params = params || {};3
  230.     // if params arg omitted, second arg may be `actions`
  231.     if (typeof params == 'function') {
  232.         actions = params;
  233.         params = {};
  234.     }
  236.     // If resource uses the path param, it's subroutes should be
  237.     // prefixed by path, not the resource's name
  238.     // i.e.:
  239.     // map.resource('users', {path: ':username'}, function(user) {
  240.     //   user.resources('posts);
  241.     // });
  242.     // 
  243.     // /:username/posts.:format?
  244.     // /:username/posts/new.:format?
  245.     // etc.
  246.     var prefix = params.path ? params.path : name;3
  248.     // we have bunch of actions here, will create routes for them
  249.     var activeRoutes = getActiveRoutes(params);3
  250.     // but first, create subroutes
  251.     if (typeof actions == 'function') {
  252.         if (params.singleton)
  253.           this.subroutes(prefix, actions); // singletons don't need to specify an id
  254.         else
  255.           this.subroutes(prefix + '/:' + (singularize(name) || name) + '_id', actions);
  256.     }
  257.     // now let's walk through action routes
  258.     for (var action in activeRoutes) {
  259.         (function (action) {
  260.             var route = activeRoutes[action].split(/\s+/);21
  261.             var method = route[0];21
  262.             var path = route[1];21
  264.             // append format
  265.             if (path == '/') {
  266.                 path = '.:format?';6
  267.             } else {
  268.                 path += '.:format?';15
  269.             }
  271.             // middleware logic (backward compatibility)
  272.             var middlewareExcept = params.middlewareExcept, skipMiddleware = false;21
  273.             if (middlewareExcept) {
  274.                 if (typeof middlewareExcept == 'string') {
  275.                     middlewareExcept = [middlewareExcept];
  276.                 }
  277.                 middlewareExcept.forEach(function (a) {
  278.                     if (a == action) {
  279.                         skipMiddleware = true;
  280.                     }
  281.                 });
  282.             }
  284.             // params.path setting allows to override common path component
  285.             var effectivePath = (params.path || name) + path;21
  287.             var controller = params.controller || name;21
  289.             // and call map.{get|post|update|delete}
  290.             // with the path, controller, middleware and options
  291.             this[method.toLowerCase()].call(
  292.                 this,
  293.                 effectivePath,
  294.                 controller + '#' + action,
  295.                 skipMiddleware ? [] : params.middleware,
  296.                 getParams(action, params)
  297.             );21
  298.         }.bind(this))(action);21
  299.     }
  301.     // calculate set of routes based on params.only and params.except
  302.     function getActiveRoutes(params) {
  303.         var activeRoutes = {},
  304.             availableRoutes =
  305.             {   'index':   'GET     /'
  306.             ,   'create':  'POST    /'
  307.             ,   'new':     'GET     /new'
  308.             ,   'edit':    'GET     /:id/edit'
  309.             ,   'destroy': 'DELETE  /:id'
  310.             ,   'update':  'PUT     /:id'
  311.             ,   'show':    'GET     /:id'
  312.             },
  313.             availableRoutesSingleton = 
  314.             {   'show':    'GET     /'
  315.             ,   'create':  'POST    /'
  316.             ,   'new':     'GET     /new'
  317.             ,   'edit':    'GET     /edit'
  318.             ,   'destroy': 'DELETE  /'
  319.             ,   'update':  'PUT     /'
  320.             };3
  322.         if (params.singleton)
  323.           availableRoutes = availableRoutesSingleton;3
  325.         // 1. only
  326.         if (params.only) {
  327.             if (typeof params.only == 'string') {
  328.                 params.only = [params.only];
  329.             }
  330.             params.only.forEach(function (action) {
  331.                 if (action in availableRoutes) {
  332.                     activeRoutes[action] = availableRoutes[action];
  333.                 }
  334.             });
  335.         }
  336.         // 2. except
  337.         else if (params.except) {
  338.             if (typeof params.except == 'string') {
  339.                 params.except = [params.except];
  340.             }
  341.             for (var action in availableRoutes) {
  342.                 if (params.except.indexOf(action) == -1) {
  343.                     activeRoutes[action] = availableRoutes[action];
  344.                 }
  345.             }
  346.         }
  347.         // 3. all
  348.         else {
  349.             for (var action in availableRoutes) {
  350.                 activeRoutes[action] = availableRoutes[action];21
  351.             }
  352.         }
  353.         return activeRoutes;3
  354.     }
  356.     function getParams(action, params) {
  357.         var p = {};21
  358.         var plural = action === 'index' || action === 'create';21
  359.         if (params.as) {
  360.             p.as = plural ? params.as : singularize(params.as);7
  361.             p.as = self.urlHelperName(self.globPath + p.as);7
  362.             if (action === 'new' || action === 'edit') {
  363.                 p.as = action + '_' + p.as;2
  364.             }
  365.         }
  366.         if (params.path && !p.as) {
  367.             var aname = plural ? name : singularize(name);
  368.             aname = self.urlHelperName(self.globPath + aname);
  369.             p.as = action === 'new' || action === 'edit' ? action + '_' + aname : aname;
  370.         }
  371.         return p;21
  372.     }
  373. };1
  375. Map.prototype.resource = function(name, params, actions) {
  376.   var self = this;
  377.   // params are optional
  378.   params = params || {};
  379.   // if params arg omitted, second arg may be `actions`
  380.   if (typeof params == 'function') {
  381.       actions = params;
  382.       params = {};
  383.   }
  384.   params.singleton = true;
  385.   return this.resources(name, params, actions);
  386. }
  388. /*
  389.  * Namespaces mapper.
  390.  *
  391.  * Example:
  392.  *
  393.  *     map.namespace('admin', function (admin) {
  394.  *         admin.resources('user');
  395.  *     });
  396.  *
  397.  */
  398. Map.prototype.namespace = function (name, options, subroutes) {
  399.     if (typeof options === 'function') {
  400.         subroutes = options;2
  401.         options = null;2
  402.     }
  403.     if (options && typeof options.middleware === 'function') {
  404.         options.middleware = [options.middleware];
  405.     }
  406.     // store previous ns
  407.     var old_ns = this.ns, oldGlobPath = this.globPath;2
  408.     // add new ns to old (ensure tail slash present)
  409.     this.ns = old_ns + name.replace(/\/$/, '') + '/';2
  410.     this.globPath = oldGlobPath + name.replace(/\/$/, '') + '/';2
  411.     if (options && options.middleware) {
  412.         this.middlewareStack = this.middlewareStack.concat(options.middleware);
  413.     }
  414.     subroutes(this);2
  415.     if (options && options.middleware) {
  416.         options.middleware.forEach([].pop.bind(this.middlewareStack));
  417.     }
  418.     this.ns = old_ns;2
  419.     this.globPath = oldGlobPath;2
  420. };1
  422. Map.prototype.subroutes = function (name, subroutes) {
  423.     // store previous ns
  424.     var oldGlobPath = this.globPath;
  425.     // add new ns to old (ensure tail slash present)
  426.     this.globPath = oldGlobPath + name.replace(/\/$/, '') + '/';
  427.     subroutes(this);
  428.     this.globPath = oldGlobPath;
  429. };1
  431. /**
  432.  * Load routing map from module at `path`. Module should have `routes` function
  433.  * or export single function:
  434.  *
  435.  *     module.exports = function (map) {
  436.  *         map.resources('books');
  437.  *     });
  438.  */
  439. Map.prototype.addRoutes = function (path, customBridge) {
  440.     var map = this;
  441.     var routes = require(path);
  442.     routes = routes.routes || routes;
  443.     if (typeof routes !== 'function') {
  444.         throw new Error('Routes is not defined in ' + path);
  445.     }
  446.     // temporarily change bridge
  447.     if (customBridge) {
  448.         bridge = map.bridge;
  449.         map.bridge = customBridge;
  450.     }
  451.     var r = routes(map);
  452.     if (customBridge) {
  453.         map.bridge = bridge;
  454.     }
  455.     return r;
  456. };1
